name: Merino Sport 150 Mount Hood Moon Graphic Tee - Men's

features: Fabric combines the moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance of Merino with the durability and quick dry time of polyester
Flatlock seam construction designed to minimize chafing
Offset shoulder and side seams designed to increase comfort and minimize chafing while wearing a backpack
Material Content: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Polyester, Exclusive of Decoration
